extension.name: Grant Program MultiFund
extension.description: This extension allows a backend user to add multiple fund sources for a grant.

maintainer.author: Monish Deb, Joe Murray, JMA Consulting

extension.comments: The accounting entries produced by the extension can be included in Financial Batches for export/synchronization to various accounting systems. JMA would like to thank Megaphone Technology Consulting and the AGBU for generously sponsoring the development of this extension.
